name: Laptop
description: Powerful laptop with a quad-core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, and a 14-inch FHD display.

name: Smartphone
description: Feature-rich smartphone with a 6.2-inch screen, 12MP dual camera, 128GB storage, and a 4000mAh battery.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with over-ear design, 20 hours of battery life, and a sleek black color.

name: Watches
description: Smartwatch with a 1.3-inch AMOLED display, water-resistant design, fitness tracking features, and a stylish silver color.

name: Speakers
description: High-quality wireless headphones with over-ear design, 20 hours of battery life, and a sleek black color.

name: Television
description: Smartwatch with a 1.3-inch AMOLED display, water-resistant design, fitness tracking features, and a stylish silver color.

name: Air Conditioner
description: AC with 1.5 ton, inverter compatible, digital display, and a stylish model with diff colours, DUAL Inverter Compressorâ„¢ with 10 Year Warranty, Pre-Filter, Simple and Slim Design.

name: Washing Machine
description: Comprises a barrel or a drum, an inlet hose pipe along with a valve, a drain pipe, a water filter, a specialized motor, paddles, a circuit board, and a timer.

name: Refrigerator
description: Fridge with 225Ltr, inverter compatible, Autocut, and always fresh air within it with auto deforce.

name: Micorwave
description: Microwave oven is a relatively small, boxlike oven that raises the temperature of food by subjecting it to a high-frequency electromagnetic field.

name: Dishwasher
description: Dishwasher features like the 1-Hour Wash and Quick Wash Cycles and energy saving options that help you conserve hot water.

name: Air Purifier
description: Air purifiers are portable devices that combine an internal filter and fan to pull in unwanted particles from the air in a specific room.

name: Fan
description: Fan consists of a rotating arrangement of vanes or blades, made of iton, plastic, or metal, which act on the air.

name: Cooler
description: Air cooler used to cool the air in a room or an outdoor space. It operates by drawing in hot air and passing it through moistened pads, which cools the air as it evaporates the water.

name: Gas Stove
description: Gas stoves an open flame to cook food both inside the oven cavity and on the stovetop.

name: Iron
description: Iron is a lustrous, ductile, malleable, silver-gray metal and known to exist in four distinct crystalline forms. Iron rusts in damp air, but not in dry air.

name: Kettle
description: Kettle is a pot made for boiling water. Most kettles are metal, with a lid and a spout.

name: Vacuum Cleaner
description: Vacuum Cleaners are apparatus that remove and clean many kinds of surfaces by means of sucking and removing dust and small particles.
